page.title: 14 Lamberhurst Vineyard
page.content: {Lamberhurst Vineyard}is one of the largest in the country. About 25 people work there, tending the{vines}and making the{grapes}into {wine.}After picking, the presses squeeze all the juices from the grapes to produce the wine, which is stored in large tanks in the winery. Later on the bottling line fills the{bottles} with the different kinds of wine, puts on capsules and finally labels. Then the bottles are packed into boxes and sealed. There is a large{cellar}under the winery where the various types of wine are stored. {Visitors}are welcomed with guided tours and the chance to taste the wines. Lamberhurst wines regularly win prizes in national competitions and are on sale both at the vineyard and the village stores.
